What if the next big thing isn't a thing at all?
It's lots of things all waking up,...
...becoming part of the global phenomenon we call the "Internet of everything."
Trees will talk to networks who'll talk to scientists about climate change.
Cars will talk to road sensors who'll talk to stoplights about traffic efficiency.
The ambulance will talk to patient records who'll talk to doctors about saving lives.
It's going to be amazing and exciting.
And maybe, most remarkably, not that far away.
We're going to wake the world up...
...and watch with eyes wide as it gets to work.
